nodes.text: Eim'ir's Bakery was a bakery situated on the planet Corellia, on the same street street as the residence of the smuggler Sana Starros. The rogue archaeologist Doctor Chelli Aphra bribed a local urchin to bring her sweet rolls from Eim'ir's Bakery, which Aphra subsequently used to bribe Starros into showing her to the crime boss Lady Proxima.
